title: India needs investments of $200 billion to establish renewable energy assets: Nomura
description: India needs approximately USD 200 billion to develop renewable energy by 2030. Energy demand is expected to grow due to data center expansion, increasing electric vehicles, and advancements in green hydrogen. Installed power capacity should increase significantly. Government policies and industrial efforts are driving this growth. Renewable energy auctions must accelerate to meet targets.
